name: Ecommerce Smart Survey
author: Danish Husain

sections.description:
Here’s What You Can Do With Ecommerce Smart Survey Plugin…

Segment Your Visitors based On Their Interests…
Use Text Or Image Multiple Choice Answers…
Show Your Visitors Relevant Questions Based On Their Answers…
String Multiple Surveys Together To Further Drill Down Into Their Interests…
Completely Customize your Funnels…
So Much More!
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire ecommerce-smart-survey folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

You will find ‘Ecommerce Smart Survey’ menu in your WordPress admin panel.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the entire ecommerce-smart-survey folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

You will find ‘Ecommerce Smart Survey’ menu in your WordPress admin panel.

short_description: How To Sell More And Increase Conversions By Adding A Simple Survey To Any Offer
